messages.zh: 已经突破整合运动的拦截！
messages.tl: Has broken through the interception of the Reunion Movement!

messages.zh: 嘘。别让阿米娅她们听见。
messages.tl: Hey. Don't let Amiya hear them.

messages.zh: 阿米娅心里清楚的很！她比我们想象的成熟的多！
messages.tl: Amiya is very clear! She is more mature than we think!

messages.zh: 就算这样也不能让她听见。再去加深她内心的煎熬是不明智的。
messages.tl: Even this does not allow her to hear. It is unwise to deepen her inner suffering.

messages.zh: 她已经背负......太多东西了。
messages.tl: She has been carrying ... too much.

messages.zh: 别停下脚步。还不是垂头丧气的时候。
messages.tl: Don't stop. It’s not a time of dejection.

messages.zh: 耀骑士无论在什么时候，都该成为指引众人的光吧？
messages.tl: Whenever the Yao Knights should be the light to guide everyone, at all times?

messages.zh: 我会去做我应该做的事情。
messages.tl: I will do what I should do.

messages.zh: 重整队形！不要懈怠！我们就快到了！
messages.tl: Reorganize the formation! Don't slack off! We are coming soon!

messages.zh: 嘴里说着让我放心的人，真的一个都没回来过。
messages.tl: The person who said that I was relieved, I really never came back.
Let me go... let me down...

messages.zh: 没关系的。如果是Ace的话，一定没问题的。
messages.tl: it does not matter. If it is Ace, it must be no problem.

messages.zh: 罗德岛的大家，都是很强的。
messages.tl: Everyone at Rhodes Island is very strong.
Doctor... can... let me rely on it...
Actually... can... do this step... this guy...
